app.name: ichi
place.header.label: Place
place.gallery.heading: Now at this place
place.gallery.empty: No one is checked in right now.
checkin.cta.label: Presence
checkin.cta.title: Ready to check in?
checkin.status.success: You're checked in. Updating the room…
checkin.status.error: Could not complete the check-in. Please try again.
checkin.duration.title: How long are you around?
checkin.duration.description: Pick a window. You can always check in again later.
checkin.mood.title: What's your vibe?
checkin.mood.description: Give people a hint about your energy.
checkin.hint.title: Recognizability hint
checkin.hint.description: Optional: add a short clue so people can spot you.
checkin.hint.placeholder: E.g. navy cap, reading Murakami, near the window.
checkin.alias.title: Alias confirmation
checkin.alias.description: This is how you appear in the gallery. Regenerate if you want a fresh combo.
